AllowMultipleLogins.description: Allow already loged user to login on another instance of application.

DatabaseTables.description: SQL commands to create table structure in database.

DefVariantDefaultMatchCase.description: It determines whether to look at upper and lower case letters.

AllowAnimateAddingBlockGeneral.description: Adding base Block can be animated.

AnimateAddingBlockGeneralDuration.description: Duration in seconds while animating base Block in process of adding to layout.

AllowAnimateRemovingBlockGeneral.description: Removing base Block can be animated.

AnimateRemovingBlockGeneralDuration.description: Duration in seconds while animating base Block in process of removing from layout.

CssBlockTypeBackgroundUNDEFINED.description: CSS settings for backround if BlockType is UNDEFINED

CssBlockTypeBackgroundDIARY.description: CSS settings for backround if BlockType is DIARY

MaxLastCount.description: Maximum number of last used items

MaxMostCount.description: Maximum number of most used items

SelectionLastMost_MaxChars.description: Maximum number of most used items

Selection_ImageHeight.description: Image height of icon displayed left by item name

Selection_ImageWidth.description: Image height of icon displayed left by item name

MaxShownItemsInClipboard.description: Maximum items in clipboard that can be shown i dialogs like Selection
